metadata.title: CVE-2024-0743 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An unchecked return value in TLS handshake code could have caused apotentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 122.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
